```{R}
getData <- function(fileName=NULL){
  if(is.null(fileName)){
    dataFrame <- data.frame(ID=1:20, 
                            varA=runif(20),
                            varB=runif(20))
  } else {
    dataFrame <- read.table(file=fileName, 
                            header = TRUE, 
                            sep = ",",
                            stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
  }
    return(dataFrame)
}

getData()
```
